description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High-Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) adds Temporary Train Services
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時列車服務

2025-06-23T15:19:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that
As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will arrange the following temporary train trips:


From Shenzhenbei Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station

• Jun 25: Train G9531

• Jun 27: Train G9537

• Jun 28: Train G9531, G9541, G9545, G9675


From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station

• Jun 27: Train G9792

• Jun 30: Train G9546

• Jul 1: Train G9534


From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Guangzhounan Station

• Jun 30: Train G9532


Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app; appointed travel agents (Click
here); or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 


For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app, or the High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
2025-06-23T15:19:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路部門通知，高速鐵路（香港段）將加開以下臨時車次：


由深圳北站前往香港西九龍站

•6月25日：G9531

•6月27日：G9537

•6月28日：G9531,G9541,G9545,G9675


由香港西九龍站前往深圳北站

•6月27日：G9792

•6月30日：G9546

•7月1日：G9534


由香港西九龍站前往廣州南站

•6月30日：G9532


你可透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、指定代理(按此)或前往香港西九龍站購買列車車票。


有關列車服務詳情，請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Entrances/Exits Arrangements in Exhibition Centre Station

2025-06-26T09:43:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that because of road closures near the station, Entrance/Exit B1 in Exhibition Centre is temporarily closed. Please use other Entrances/Exits.
2025-06-26T09:43:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，由於站外有封路措施，會展站B1出入口暫時關閉，請使用其他出入口。

2025-06-26T10:59:00.CONTENT_EN: Because of road closures near the station, Entrance/Exit B1 in Exhibition Centre is temporarily closed. Please use other Entrances/Exits.   At the same time, affected bus routes gradually resume to their original routeings.
2025-06-26T10:59:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於站外有封路措施，會展站B1出入口暫時關閉，請使用其他出入口。  同時，受影響巴士路線陸續恢復原有路線行駛。
